name: R5MedicinalProductContactTypeForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.ProductContactType for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicinal-product-contact-type|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicinal-product-contact-type|5.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* `MedicinalProductDefinition.contact.type` as Example

Across FHIR versions, the value set has been mapped as:
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicinal-product-contact-type|5.0.0`
* `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medicinal-product-contact-type|4.3.0`

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:
All concepts in the comparison are have code literals listed as identical.
The source and target value sets have the same number of active concepts (5).
